show_description.label: Show description
show_description.comment: show description in front of image

delay.label: Slider Interval
delay.comment: The time one slide stays on the screen in Milliseconds.

height.label: Start Height
height.comment: This Height of the Grid where the Captions are displayed in Pixel. This Height is the Max height of Slider in Fullwidth Layout and in Responsive Layout. In Fullscreen Layout the Gird will be centered Vertically in case the Slider is higher then this value.

hidethumbs.label: Hide Thumbs
hidethumbs.comment: 0 - Never hide Thumbs. 1000- 100000 (ms) hide thumbs and navigation arrows, bullets after the predefined ms (1000ms == 1 sec, 1500 == 1,5 sec etc..)

thumbwidth.label: Thumb Width
thumbwidth.comment: Thumb With and Height and Amount (only if navigation Tyope set to thumb !)

thumbheight.label: Thumb Height
thumbheight.comment: The width and height of the thumbs in pixel. Thumbs are not responsive from basic. For Responsive Thumbs you will need to create media qury based thumb sizes.

thumbamount.label: Thumb Amount
thumbamount.comment: The Amount of visible Thumbs in the same time. The rest of the thumbs are only visible on hover, or at slide change.

navigationtype.label: Navigation Type
navigationtype.comment: Display type of the navigation bar

navigationarrows.label: Navigation Arrows
navigationarrows.comment: Display position of the Navigation Arrows

navigationstyle.label: Navigation Style
navigationstyle.comment: Look of the navigation bullets if navigationType "bullet" selected.

navigationhalign.label: Navigation H Align
navigationhalign.comment: Vertical and Horizontal Align of the Navigation bullets / thumbs (depending on which Style has been selected).

navigationvalign.label: Navigation V Align
navigationvalign.comment: Vertical and Horizontal Align of the Navigation bullets / thumbs (depending on which Style has been selected).

navigationhoffset.label: Navigation H Offset
navigationhoffset.comment: The Offset position of the navigation depending on the aligned position. from -1000 to +1000 any value in px. i.e. -30

navigationvoffset.label: Navigation V Offset
navigationvoffset.comment: The Offset position of the navigation depending on the aligned position. from -1000 to +1000 any value in px. i.e. -30

soloarrowlefthalign.label: Solo Arrow Left H Align
soloarrowlefthalign.comment: Vertical and Horizontal Align of the Navigation Arrows (left and right independent!)

soloarrowleftvalign.label: Solo Arrow Left V Align
soloarrowleftvalign.comment: Vertical and Horizontal Align of the Navigation Arrows (left and right independent!)

soloarrowlefthoffset.label: Solo Arrow Left H Offset
soloarrowlefthoffset.comment: The Offset position of the navigation depending on the aligned position. from -1000 to +1000 any value in px. i.e. -30 Each Arrow independent

soloarrowleftvoffset.label: Solo Arrow Left V Offset
soloarrowleftvoffset.comment: The Offset position of the navigation depending on the aligned position. from -1000 to +1000 any value in px. i.e. -30 Each Arrow independent

soloarrowrighthalign.label: Solo Arrow Right H Align
soloarrowrighthalign.comment: Vertical and Horizontal Align of the Navigation Arrows (left and right independent!)

soloarrowrightvalign.label: Solo Arrow Right V Align
soloarrowrightvalign.comment: Vertical and Horizontal Align of the Navigation Arrows (left and right independent!)

soloarrowrighthoffset.label: Solo Arrow Right H Offset
soloarrowrighthoffset.comment: The Offset position of the navigation depending on the aligned position. from -1000 to +1000 any value in px. i.e. -30 Each Arrow independent

soloarrowrightvoffset.label: Solo Arrow Right V Offset
soloarrowrightvoffset.comment: The Offset position of the navigation depending on the aligned position. from -1000 to +1000 any value in px. i.e. -30 Each Arrow independent

touchenabled.label: Touch Enabled
touchenabled.comment: Enable Swipe Function on touch devices

onhoverstop.label: On Hover Stop
onhoverstop.comment: Stop Banner Timet at Hover on Slide on/off

stopatslide.label: Stop At Slide
stopatslide.comment: Stop Timer if Slide "x" has been Reached. If stopAfterLoops set to 0, then it stops already in the first Loop at slide X which defined. -1 means do not stop at any slide. stopAfterLoops has no sinn in this case.

stopafterloops.label: Stop After Loops
stopafterloops.comment: Stop Timer if All slides has been played "x" times. IT will stop at THe slide which is defined via stopAtSlide:x, if set to -1 slide never stop automatic

hidecaptionatlimit.label: Hide Caption At Limit
hidecaptionatlimit.comment: It Defines if a caption should be shown under a Screen Resolution ( Basod on The Width of Browser)

hideallcaptionatlilmit.label: Hide All Caption At Lilmit
hideallcaptionatlilmit.comment: Hide all The Captions if Width of Browser is less then this value

hideslideratlimit.label: Hide Slider At Limit
hideslideratlimit.comment: Hide the whole slider, and stop also functions if Width of Browser is less than this value

shadow.label: Shadow
shadow.comment: Possible values: 0,1,2,3 (0 == no Shadow, 1,2,3 - Different Shadow Types)
